Article Title: Rinku Singh‚Äôs father Khanchand Singh passes away after cancer battle
Article Text:
Rinku Singh (Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

A father‚Äôs sacrifice behind Rinku‚Äôs rise

NEW DELHI: Indian cricketer Rinku Singh suffered a heartbreaking personal loss on Friday morning as his father, Khanchand Singh, passed away at Yatharth Hospital in Greater Noida after battling advanced-stage liver cancer. He was on ventilator support for the past few days, hospital officials confirmed.Dr Sunil Kumar, spokesperson of the hospital, said Khanchand Singh‚Äôs condition had deteriorated significantly after being admitted on February 21. ‚ÄúHe was placed on ventilator support and breathed his last early this morning,‚Äù Kumar stated. Family sources also confirmed the news, saying he had been fighting liver cancer for some time.Rinku, who is part of India‚Äôs T20 World Cup squad, had briefly returned home earlier in the tournament after his father‚Äôs health worsened following India‚Äôs Super 8 fixture against South Africa. Despite the emotional turmoil, the 28-year-old rejoined the squad in Chennai ahead of the Zimbabwe clash on February 26. Though he did not feature in the playing XI, he was present with the team during India‚Äôs convincing win.Former India spinner Harbhajan Singh expressed his condolences in a heartfelt post on X. ‚ÄúPained to learn about the demise of Shri Khanchand Singh Ji, father of Rinku Singh. This must be an especially difficult time for Rinku and his family‚Ä¶ May Waheguru grant eternal peace to the departed soul and give strength and courage to the bereaved family,‚Äù he wrote.Rinku‚Äôs former coach, Masood Amini, also confirmed the passing, noting that Khanchand Singh had been on ventilator support for the last three to four days.A resident of Aligarh in Uttar Pradesh, Rinku has often spoken about his father‚Äôs sacrifices. Khanchand Singh worked in gas cylinder distribution and supported his son‚Äôs cricketing ambitions despite financial hardships. In a touching moment last year, he attended Rinku‚Äôs engagement ceremony in Lucknow, even while battling illness. The cricketer is engaged to Samajwadi Party MP Priya Saroj.The last rites will be performed in Aligarh later in the day, with Rinku expected to attend.As India prepare for their upcoming clash against West Indies, cricket takes a backseat for the young batter, who now mourns the loss of the man he credits as his biggest pillar of strength.
Article Summary: Indian cricketer rinku singh's father, khanchand singh, passes away at hospital. The 28-year-old was on ventilator support after battling advanced-stage liver cancer. Former india spinner harbhajan singh expressed his condolences on twitter.

Article Title: Matthew Tkachuk calls Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid best player in the world
Article Text:
Matthew Tkachuk #19 of the Florida Panthers and Stuart Skinner #74 of the Edmonton Oilers shake hands after Game Six of the 2025 Stanley Cup Final between the Edmonton Oilers and the Florida Panthers at Amerant Bank Arena on June 17, 2025 in Sunrise, Florida. The Panthers won the Stanley Cup Final series 4-2. (Photo by Brian Babineau/NHLI via Getty Images)

Matthew Tkachuk on Connor McDavid 's Olympic gold medal game



Florida Panthers forward Matthew Tkachuk did not hesitate when asked to describe his longtime rival following the Olympic final. Despite years of intense playoff battles, Tkachuk openly labeled Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid as the best player in the world after their latest showdown on international ice.The praise came after Team USA‚Äôs dramatic victory over Canada in the gold medal game at the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic Winter Games, adding another chapter to a rivalry shaped by Stanley Cup Finals clashes and high-stakes NHL matchups.After Team USA's close win over Canada, Matthew Tkachuk talked openly about how Connor McDavid has changed the game. The Florida Panthers star said that no other player has the same speed, vision, and puck control as the captain of the Edmonton Oilers.Tkachuk's words came after a key moment in the gold medal game. McDavid broke in alone on United States goaltender Connor Hellebuyck while Canada was behind and the game was still up for grabs. The play could have changed the course of the game and the story of the tournament.Instead, Hellebuyck made a key save that kept the Americans' small lead. Tkachuk later called the moment a turning point and said that stopping a player like McDavid on a breakaway takes calmness and perfect timing.The Florida Panthers forward said that if McDavid had scored, it might have changed the mood of the game. With veteran leader Sidney Crosby out because of an injury, the focus naturally turned to the captain of the Edmonton Oilers to step up for Canada.Team USA won gold in the end, but Tkachuk made it clear that he still respects McDavid. Their rivalry, which started in the Stanley Cup Finals and has continued through tough NHL games, is still a big part of this era of hockey.Tkachuk's comments are a reminder for fans who read the latest NHL news and updates: even fierce rivals can see greatness when they see it.
Article Summary: Matthew tkachuk said that connor mcdavid has the same speed, vision, and puck control as him. The praise came after team usa‚Äôs dramatic victory over canada in the gold medal game at the milano cortina 2026 olympic winter games. Their rivalry started in the stanley cup finals and has continued through tough nhl games.

Article Title: Lionel Messi knocked down by fan during Inter Miami match - Watch
Article Text:
Inter Miami forward Lionel Messi (10) reacts on the ground after a play during the second half of an MLS soccer match against Los Angeles FC, Saturday, Feb. 21, 2026, in Los Angeles, Calif. (AP Photo)

Lionel Messi was brought down after a fan ran onto the field at the end of Inter Miami CF‚Äôs friendly match against Independiente del Valle in Puerto Rico on Thursday.The incident took place around the 88th minute at Juan Ram√≥n Loubriel Stadium in Bayam√≥n. A supporter ran towards the centre circle and grabbed Messi by the waist from behind. A security guard tried to remove the fan, and in the process both the fan and Messi fell to the ground. Messi appeared unharmed. He got up quickly and walked away to another part of the pitch.One fan had approached him from behind without him noticing. As the supporter held him, a security official intervened. The attempt to pull the fan away led to Messi also being knocked down. The fan was unable to take a selfie. Several supporters entered the pitch during the exhibition match.The game had originally been scheduled for February 13 but was postponed after Messi felt discomfort in his leg during a previous exhibition fixture against Barcelona SC.Santiago Morales and Messi scored in the 16th and 70th minutes as Inter Miami won 2-1.Miami had begun its MLS season with a 3-0 defeat to Los Angeles FC and will next play Orlando City SC on Sunday.
Article Summary: Lionel messi was brought down after a fan ran onto the field at the end of inter miami cf‚Äôs friendly match against independiente del valle in puerto rico on thursday. The incident took place around the 88th minute at juan ram√≥n loubriel stadium in bayam√≥n. A supporter ran towards the centre circle and grabbed messi by the waist from behind.

Article Title: India vs Pakistan T20 World Cup final loading? The exact scenario explained
Article Text:
AFP Photo

India land in Kolkata for do-or-die WI clash | Semi-final spot on the line

India‚Äôs T20 World Cup semifinal qualification scenario



Can India and Pakistan meet again in T20 World Cup?



Could the cricket world be set for another blockbuster India vs Pakistan showdown at the T20 World Cup 2026? The possibility is still alive ‚Äî but several pieces must fall into place.So far, South Africa national cricket team and England cricket team have confirmed their semi-final berths. That leaves two spots up for grabs, with India national cricket team, West Indies cricket team, Pakistan national cricket team and New Zealand national cricket team still in contention.England booked their place in the last four after a tense four-wicket win over New Zealand at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo, completing the Super Eights stage unbeaten with three wins from three matches to top Group 2.New Zealand sit second with three points. Pakistan, meanwhile, remain mathematically alive ‚Äî but only just.For Pakistan to qualify, they must beat Sri Lanka in their final Super Eight fixture ‚Äî and by a massive margin. Their Net Run Rate of -0.461 pales in comparison to New Zealand‚Äôs +1.390. Pakistan need a thumping win over Zimbabwe on Saturday.India, the defending champions, responded in style with a dominant 72-run victory over Zimbabwe at the MA Chidambaram Stadium.After West Indies‚Äô heavy defeat to South Africa, the equation is simple for the Suryakumar Yadav-led side: defeat West Indies in their final Super Eight clash at Eden Gardens on March 1 and they are through to the semi-finals ‚Äî irrespective of the margin.However, if rain forces a washout, West Indies would move to three points and seal qualification instead.An India-Pakistan clash is possible ‚Äî but only if both teams make the knockouts.If Pakistan somehow finish in the top two of Group 2 and India qualify from their group, the two sides could face off in:The semi-final ‚Äî depending on final group positions.The final ‚Äî if both teams win their respective semi-finals.At present, India‚Äôs route appears clear-cut. Pakistan, on the other hand, require a dominant display and favourable results elsewhere to keep alive hopes of another high-voltage encounter between cricket‚Äôs fiercest rivals.
Article Summary: India, the defending champions, responded in style with a dominant 72-run victory over zimbabwe at the ma chidambaram stadium. Pakistan, meanwhile, remain mathematically alive ‚Äî but only just. England booked their place in the last four after a tense four-wicket win over new zealand at the r premadasa stadium in colombo.

Article Title: T20 World Cup 2026 Super 8 Points Table: India set for virtual quarterfinal as South Africa seal semis spot
Article Text:
Team India (Pic credit: BCCI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

India keep T20 World Cup dream alive, over to Kolkata now

T20 World Cup Super 8 Group 1 Points Table

P W L NR Points NRR South Africa (Q) 2 2 0 0 4 +2.890 West Indies 2 1 1 0 2 +1.791 India 2 1 1 0 2 -0.100 Zimbabwe (E) 2 0 2 0 0 -4.475

T20 World Cup Super 8 Group 2 Points Table



P W L NR Points NRR England (Q) 3 3 0 0 6 +1.491 New Zealand 3 1 1 1 3 +1.390 Pakistan 2 0 1 1 1 -0.461 Sri Lanka (E) 2 0 2 0 0 -2.800

NEW DELHI: The Super 8 stage of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has reached its decisive phase, and the latest points table leaves defending champions India with a clear equation ‚Äî beat West Indies on Sunday and book a place in the semi-finals.Group 1 witnessed a dramatic shake-up on Thursday. South Africa stormed into the last four with a commanding nine-wicket win over West Indies in Ahmedabad, chasing down 177 in just 16.1 overs. A blistering 95-run opening stand between Aiden Markram (82 not out) and Quinton de Kock (47) set the tone, while Ryan Rickelton‚Äôs unbeaten 45 sealed the deal as the Proteas finished at 177/1. The victory extended South Africa‚Äôs unbeaten run in the tournament and confirmed their semi-final berth.India, meanwhile, kept their title defence alive with a thumping 72-run victory over Zimbabwe in Chennai. That result, coupled with South Africa‚Äôs dominance, has set up a virtual quarterfinal between India and West Indies at Eden Gardens on Sunday. Both teams sit on two points from two matches, making it a straight shootout for the second semi-final spot from Group 1.While South Africa face Zimbabwe in their final Super 8 fixture, all eyes will be on Kolkata, where the winner of India vs West Indies will advance.In Group 2, England beat New Zealand by four wickets to stay unbeaten in the Super Eights and keep Pakistan‚Äôs semifinal hopes alive.After restricting New Zealand to 159/7, England chased down 161/6 in 19.3 overs. New Zealand remain second, while Pakistan must win big against Sri Lanka to qualify for the semifinals.With knockout spots on the line and net run rates in play, the race to the semi-finals is now at boiling point. Sunday‚Äôs India-West Indies clash promises to decide more than just two points ‚Äî it will determine who keeps their World Cup dream alive.
Article Summary: The super 8 stage of the icc men's t20 world cup has reached its decisive phase. The latest points table leaves defending champions india with a clear equation ‚Äî beat west indies on sunday and book a place in the semi-finals. South africa stormed into the last four with a commanding nine-wicket win over west indies in ahmedabad.

Article Title: Tyrese Haliburton's fiancee Jade Jones issues heartfelt gesture for Indiana Pacers star's 26th birthday
Article Text:
Jade Jones and Tyrese Haliburton (Image via getty)

Jade Jones posts image of customized cake on Tyrese Haliburton 's 26th birthday

Image via Jade Jones/Instagram (screengrab)

When are Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones getting married?

Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones are one of the most talked-about couples in the NBA . The duo have showcased their appreciation towards each other publicly on multiple occasions. Recently, Jones posted an image on Instagram . She celebrated the Indiana Pacers star‚Äôs birthday with a heartfelt gesture. Tyrese turned 26 this year.Tyrese and Jade started dating in the year 2019. They met during their college days in Iowa. Jones is a schoolteacher. Despite their demanding careers, the duo have managed to show their support towards each other. On July 28, 2025, the Indiana Pacers star proposed to his girlfriend and since then, fans have been eagerly waiting for the announcement of their marriage dates.An interesting fact about Tyrese Haliburton is that his birthday is on February 29. He was born in the year 2000. Since the day comes only once every four years, his birthday is celebrated during the last couple of days in the month of February. The Indiana Pacers star‚Äôs fianc√©e, Jade Jones, carried out a heartfelt gesture this year, too. She posted an adorable picture on her Instagram story. The story featured a birthday cake with ‚ÄúHappy Birthday‚Äù written on it. It also had the candles representing the 26th birthday of the athlete.What made the cake even more adorable was the fact that it was a customized one with Tyrese‚Äôs childhood picture printed on it.It wasn‚Äôt any other picture. The image went viral way before when the Pacers star had uploaded it after winning Gold in the Olympics with LeBron James. In the image, young Tyrese could be seen wearing a LeBron jersey. This indicated how the young athlete had forever idolized the NBA legend.This is not the first time Jade has shown her appreciation for the athlete publicly. The duo have constantly sent subtle gestures towards each other since their relationship went public. Their way of mutual appreciation and adorable gestures has made them one of the favorite couples within the league.Tyrese Haliburton and Jade Jones have been dating each other since their college days. The Indiana Pacers star proposed to Jones in the month of July, 2025. Since then, fans have been wondering about the possible dates when the duo would get hitched. Recently, Jones posted on Instagram, revealing the year in which they would get married. Captioning the post, Jones wrote, ‚Äú2026 the year I become a wifeyyy.‚Äù Now that the year is known, the wait is for the specific date when the couple will tie the knot forever.
Article Summary: Jade jones posts image of customized cake on tyrese haliburton's 26th birthday. The indiana pacers star proposed to jones in the month of july, 2025. Since then, fans have been wondering about the possible dates when the duo would get hitched.

Article Title: ‚ÄúClinging to scraps‚Äù: Bill Belichick stuns fans with new look while attending a game with 24-year-old girlfriend Jordon Hudson
Article Text:
Bill Belichick stuns fans with new look while attending a game with 24-year old girlfriend Jordon Hudson (Getty Images)

Bill Belichick‚Äôs longer hairstyle steals the spotlight in the stands as he attends the game with his girlfriend, Jordon Hudson

Bill Belichick has stayed in headlines well beyond the sidelines. Over the past two years, much of that attention has centered on his relationship with Jordon Hudson. The 73-year-old coach and the 24-year-old former college cheerleader first drew public interest after their romance became official in June 2024. Since then, every joint appearance has fueled debate and curiosity.Recently, the head coach was spotted at a game with Hudson, and this time it was not just their presence that caught attention. Belichick showed up with a noticeably new hairstyle. The look quickly went viral online and broke the internet with multiple reactions.Belichick kept his outfit simple, wearing a dark short-sleeve zip-up over a blue shirt. However, his grooming told a different story. He appears to be growing his hair long, with fuller strands brushing around the sides and back instead of the tight, cropped style fans knew from his New England Patriots era. The longer hair gave him a more relaxed, almost off-duty look as he greeted people and moved through the seating area with Hudson, who was dressed in all black and wore sunglasses to complete her look.As the look went viral, many fans poured in their reactions. A fan said, ‚ÄúClinging to scraps.‚ÄùAnother added, ‚ÄúYikes, Bill is growing his hair out. Guess what, BIG DEAL, HE CAN DO WHATEVER HE WANTS; HE IS AN ADULT.‚ÄùOne more fan added, ‚ÄúBill Belichick with long hair?! üò≥ Never thought we‚Äôd see the day‚Ä¶ the man‚Äôs legendary on the field AND now making headlines off it too! üèàüëÄ" A folk added, "They make a nice couple."Their relationship has stayed under the microscope. Reports state they first met in February 2021 on a flight from the Boston area to Florida. They were later seen together in January 2023, months before news of their romance surfaced publicly. Hudson, a former Bridgewater State University cheerleader and 2021 NCA Collegiate Champion, has supported Belichick at several major events, including NFL Honors in February 2025 and public outings tied to his coaching career.Public scrutiny has followed them, especially regarding their age gap. In April 2025, during a CBS Sunday Morning interview, Hudson firmly shut down personal questions about their relationship. Belichick later defended her in a statement, clarifying that he had asked for the focus to remain on his book.Now, with his long hair becoming a viral talking point, Belichick once again finds himself at the center of online chatter. This time, it is not about defense schemes or Super Bowl rings. It is about a hairstyle that signals a visible shift in the image of one of football‚Äôs most recognizable figures.
Article Summary: Bill belichick was spotted at a game with his girlfriend, jordon hudson. The 73-year-old head coach showed up with a noticeably new hairstyle. The look quickly went viral online and broke the internet with multiple reactions. He appears to be growing his hair long, with fuller strands brushing around the sides.

Article Title: Ex-captain Sourav Ganguly's message to India selectors: Take Auqib Nabi to England
Article Text:
Photo/Agencies

India keep T20 World Cup dream alive, over to Kolkata now

'England is the place to start in the summer,' said former India captain Sourav Ganguly, backing Jammu and Kashmir pacer Auqib Nabi for national selection after his five-wicket haul in the Ranji Trophy final against Karnataka at the KSCA Hubli Cricket Ground on Friday.Nabi returned figures of 5/54 in 23 overs as J&K bowled Karnataka out for 293 to secure a first-innings lead of 291 runs in the summit clash. He now leads the wicket charts this season with 60 wickets in 10 matches at an average of 12.56, including seven five-wicket hauls.In a post on X, Ganguly said Nabi should be considered for India‚Äôs white-ball tour of England in July 2026, where India are scheduled to play five T20Is and three ODIs. The series will be part of preparations for the 2027 ODI World Cup in South Africa."J&K has shown the world what effort and intent can do ..They have made that region so proud of them. Tough environment makes tough people. Aqib nabi on his way to national colours. England is the place to start in the summer," Ganguly wrote.With only a few sessions left in the final, a draw appears likely, which would hand Jammu and Kashmir their maiden Ranji Trophy title on the basis of the first-innings lead.Earlier, former India wicketkeeper Dinesh Karthik had also praised Nabi‚Äôs season, noting that he has featured in all matches and performed across conditions."Watching this Ranji Trophy campaign and following it closely, one thing I can say for certain, for all the young boys and girls out there playing this sport and wanting to represent the country, do it the AAQIB NABI way. Can't think of any pacer/player in a long time doing what he's done," he wrote on X."Domination from start to end and almost single-handedly winning the domestic tournament that matters the most to get into the national side," he wrote."Fitness across the whole campaign, bowling those long spells and across different soils and weather conditions and whether there's been any help for a pacer or not, he's been there for his team with the belief every time he's had the ball to STRIKE for his team."Hats off to you, AAQIB, you're an absolute champion and hope you get a lot of success that comes your way and may you be the lesson on how it's done to break the doors through sheer will power, skill and resilience," he added.
Article Summary: Sourav ganguly backs jammu and kashmir pacer auqib nabi for national selection. Ganguly says nabi should be considered for india‚Äôs white-ball tour of england in july 2026. J&k bowled karnataka out for 293 to secure a first-innings lead of 291 runs in the summit clash.

Article Title: Lauren Kyle breaks silence with emotional message after Connor McDavid and Canada‚Äôs crushing Olympic loss to USA
Article Text: Lauren Kyle breaks silence with emotional message after Connor McDavid and Canada‚Äôs crushing Olympic loss to USA
Article Summary: Lauren kyle breaks silence with emotional message after connor mcdavid and canada‚Äôs crushing olympic loss to usa. Kyle: ‚Äúi‚Äôm so proud of my teammates. I‚Äôve never been more proud of them.‚Äù

Article Title: NFL Rumors: Patriots set to pair Stefon Diggs and A.J. Brown with Drake Maye
Article Text:
Image via AP Photo

What reports say about Stefon Diggs vs. A.J. Brown pairing

What it means for Drake Maye and the Patriots‚Äô offense

The New England Patriots might be getting ready to make big changes to their offense before the 2026 NFL season. Several rumors say that the team is looking at trading for Philadelphia Eagles wide receiver A.J. Brown so that he may play with Stefon Diggs and inexperienced quarterback Drake Maye.After falling short in the Super Bowl, New England is expected to be aggressive in reshaping its roster, particularly at wide receiver. While Diggs led the team in production last season, the Patriots‚Äô passing attack lacked consistent firepower, prompting the front office to evaluate elite options on the trade market.According to insiders, the Patriots have internal interest in trading for Brown, who remains one of the NFL‚Äôs top wideouts. The move would likely depend on contract adjustments, particularly Diggs potentially restructuring his deal to create salary-cap flexibility.Diggs is scheduled to carry a significant cap hit for the 2026 season, but he was still New England‚Äôs most productive receiver in 2025 with over 1,000 receiving yards. Rather than moving on from him, the team reportedly sees a scenario where both receivers can coexist.The Patriots‚Äô leadership has also pointed to existing relationships as a factor.Head coach Mike Vrabel previously worked with Brown during their time with the Tennessee Titans, and that connection could play a role if trade talks advance.For Drake Maye, the addition of another elite receiver could accelerate his growth as the team‚Äôs franchise quarterback. Young passers often benefit from experienced playmakers, and a Diggs-Brown tandem would give New England one of the most balanced receiving groups in the league.Last season, the Patriots had trouble being consistent on offense, especially in important games. A better group of receivers might help open up the field, make the red zone more effective, and take some of the load off Maye to run the offense by himself.However, several hurdles remain. Philadelphia has not signaled strong willingness to move Brown, and any deal would require significant draft capital along with financial adjustments. Eagles general manager Howie Roseman recently emphasized Brown‚Äôs importance to the team, suggesting a trade is possible but unlikely without a compelling offer.Still, the idea of Diggs and Brown lining up together continues to generate buzz around the league. If New England can pull off the trade, it may be one of the most important personnel changes of the offseason and change how people think about the Patriots going into 2026.
Article Summary: The new england patriots are reportedly looking at trading for philadelphia eagles wide receiver a.j. Brown. The move would likely depend on contract adjustments, particularly diggs potentially restructuring his deal to create salary-cap flexibility. A diggs-brown tandem would give new england one of the most balanced receiving groups in the league.

Article Title: Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan at center of Denver Broncos $5.8 million decision after controversial Josh Allen AFC Divisional interception
Article Text:
Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan at center of Denver Broncos $5.8 million decision after controversial Josh Allen AFC Divisional interception (Image via Getty)

Broncos make $5.8 million contract decision on Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan after controversial Josh Allen interception

Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan is not going anywhere and the Denver Broncos have made a big $5.8 million contract decision on the defensive back who was at the center of the controversial Josh Allen interception in the AFC Divisional Round. According to ESPN NFL insider Jeremy Fowler, Denver is placing a second round tender worth $5.8 million on cornerback Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan. ‚ÄúBroncos are placing the second-round tender ($5.8M) on CB Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan, per sources,‚Äù Jeremy Fowler reported on ESPN. This means the Broncos keep control of the 25-year-old defender for now. It also means if another NFL team wants to sign him, they would have to give Denver a second round draft pick if the Broncos decide not to match the offer.Denver already has one of the strongest defenses in the NFL. While many fans are talking about changes on offense this offseason, the front office clearly does not want to weaken the secondary. Some veterans like Alex Singleton and John Franklin-Myers are hitting free agency, but bringing back Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan may have been even more important for depth and stability.Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan has quietly built a strong NFL career since entering the league as an undrafted free agent out of East Carolina in 2022. Over four seasons, he has recorded six interceptions, including two returned for touchdowns. Since 2022, he has added 24 passes defended, 195 total tackles, 16 tackles for loss, seven sacks, and nine quarterback hits. Opposing quarterbacks have posted an 84.6 passer rating when targeting him.He was also part of the much talked about play involving Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen in the AFC Divisional Round. That interception sparked debate among fans, but it showed McMillan‚Äôs awareness and positioning in a huge playoff moment.With Patrick Surtain II, Riley Moss, and Jahdae Barron in the room, Denver‚Äôs cornerback group was viewed by many analysts as one of the best in football last season. Keeping Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan on the second round tender keeps that unit together.Here is how the tender works. McMillan can still talk to other teams. If a team offers him a contract, Denver can match it and keep him. If the Broncos choose not to match, they would receive a second round draft pick as compensation.In reality, giving up a second round pick is a high price. Because of that, many around the league believe Ja‚ÄôQuan McMillan is likely to stay in Denver for at least one more season under the $5.8 million deal. The Broncos now move forward knowing one key piece of their defense remains in place.
Article Summary: Ja‚Äôquan mcmillan has quietly built a strong nfl career since entering the league as an undrafted free agent out of east carolina in 2022. Over four seasons, he has recorded six interceptions, including two returned for touchdowns. Opposing quarterbacks have posted an 84.6 passer rating when targeting him.

Article Title: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander: Is Shai Gilgeous-Alexander on a restriction? Oklahoma City Thunder superstar set for cautious return against Denver Nuggets in high-stakes clash
Article Text:
Oklahoma City Thunder guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander. (Image via AP)

Shai Gilgeous-Alexander cleared to return but minutes likely monitored against Denver Nuggets

Shai Gilgeous-Alexander remains in the MVP race as the Oklahoma City Thunder race to the top

Tonight, the Denver Nuggets (37-22) head to the Paycom Center to play the Oklahoma City Thunder (45-15), a rematch of the exciting Western Conference semifinals from the previous year. OKC won the first encounter between these two teams this season, 121-111, in Denver, and this is only the second of four matchups.Fortunately, after a nine-game absence, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander is back. On Friday night, the Oklahoma City Thunder will meet the Denver Nuggets in a nationally televised game on ESPN, marking the superstar point guard's comeback from an abdominal strain. It's unclear, though, if Gilgeous-Alexander will have limited playing time throughout the match.ESPN will broadcast the Nuggets vs. Thunder game live on Friday from Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, at 9:30 p.m. ET. The Thunder have had a terrible season due to injuries. A crucial player returns tonight, but four of the Thunder's five starters have missed at least 11 games.Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, the current MVP, has received the all-clear to resume his abdominal injury. He has already missed 11 games, but he is still eligible for regular-season accolades if he misses six more.SGA is not yet on the team's injury report for Friday's game against the Denver Nuggets, according to Tim MacMahon of ESPN. As head coach Mark Daigneault attempts to ease his lead guard back into action, Gilgeous-Alexander, the current NBA MVP, will probably have his minutes monitored in some way even if he is off the injury report and will play a part in the game.However, Daigneault has not yet disclosed whether Gilgeous-Alexander will be subject to a minute restriction for the Denver game, which begins at 8:30 p.m. Central. The Thunder are still leading the Western Conference, after all. Their star player does not need to return to the court right away.However, considering that the Thunder's superior depth has shown itself able to handle his absence over the past several weeks, it is realistic to expect that Gilgeous-Alexander will be limited to about 25 minutes.Gilgeous-Alexander needs to miss just six more games this season to meet the NBA's 65-game requirement and be eligible for MVP and other postseason honors. The Thunder, however, had a 5-4 record in their nine games without SGA. Oklahoma City continues to hold the top spot in the Western Conference, two games ahead of San Antonio. Nonetheless, the Spurs hold the season tiebreaker between the two teams and have won ten straight games.Jalen Williams, an All-NBA forward, and Ajay Mitchell, an important role player, are still absent from the Thunder. However, Gilgeous-Alexander is within striking distance of Luka Doncic of the Los Angeles Lakers in the scoring battle after averaging 31.8 points per game in 49 games this season.
Article Summary: Oklahoma city thunder guard shai gilgeous-alexander has returned from an abdominal strain. He is not yet on the team's injury report for friday's game against the denver nuggets. It's unclear if he will be subject to a minute restriction for the game. The thunder are still leading the western conference, after all.

Article Title: Cleveland Cavaliers vs Detroit Pistons injury report: Who's playing, injured and questionable players, head-to-head records, team stats, and more (February 27, 2026)
Article Text:
Detroit Pistons guard Daniss Jenkins (24) dribbles beside Cleveland Cavaliers guard Donovan Mitchell (45) (Image via Imagn)

Cleveland Cavaliers

February 27

Detroit Pistons

Cleveland Cavaliers dealing with multiple injuries vs Detroit Pistons (February 27, 2026 )

Cleveland Cavaliers vs Detroit Pistons Full team rosters (February 27, 2026)

Cleveland Cavaliers vs Detroit Pistons Season series and head-to-head record

Cleveland Cavaliers vs Detroit Pistons Team stats comparison

Cleveland Cavaliers vs Detroit Pistons Players to watch (February 27, 2026)

Cleveland Cavaliers vs Detroit Pistons Game outlook (February 27, 2026)

Thetravel to Detroit onfor an important Eastern Conference game against the Pistons.lead the conference at 43-14, while Cleveland is fourth at 37-23.This game matters for both sides. Detroit is trying to hold its position at the top. Cleveland is trying to stay close to the top group. Injuries could play a major role in how this game unfolds at Little Caesars Arena.Cleveland Cavaliers will be without Donovan Mitchell due to a right groin strain. Max Strus is also out with a left foot Jones fracture. The injury list could grow depending on game-time decisions.James Harden (right thumb fracture), Dennis Schr√∂der (right ankle sprain), Keon Ellis (left index finger fracture), and Dean Wade (right ankle sprain) are all listed as questionable. That leaves Cleveland with limited options, especially in the backcourt.Detroit does not have the same issues. Bobi Klintman is questionable with an adductor strain but has not played a big role this season. Cade Cunningham and Jalen Duren are both expected to play.Cleveland Cavaliers: Jarrett Allen, Evan Mobley, James Harden, Dennis Schr√∂der, Donovan Mitchell (out), Max Strus (out), Dean Wade (questionable), Keon Ellis (questionable), Larry Nance Jr.,Craig Porter Jr., Tyrese Proctor, Sam Merrill, Thomas Bryant, Darius Brown II, Riley Minix, Nae‚ÄôQwan Tomlin, Jaylon Tyson, Tristan Enaruna.Detroit Pistons: Cade Cunningham, Jalen Duren, Ausar Thompson, Isaiah Stewart, Tobias Harris, Duncan Robinson, Ron Holland, Kevin Huerter, Javonte Green, Daniss Jenkins, Caris LeVert, Paul Reed, Marcus Sasser, Chaz Lanier, Bobi Klintman (questionable), Dario ≈†ariƒá, Tolu Smith, Wendell Moore (two-way).Detroit leads the all-time series 134-109 across 243 regular-season games. Cleveland won 114-110 on January 4, 2026.Detroit has been strong at home this season, which gives them an edge going into this game.Stat (Per Game, Rank) Cavaliers PistonsRecord 37-23 (4th East) 43-14 (1st East)Points Scored 119.5 (10th) 117.4 (8th)Points Allowed 115.1 (14th) ~109.5 (+7.9 margin, 2nd)Rebounds 44.7 (8th) Strong ORB focusAssists 28.4 (8th) 25.8+ in samplesFG% / 3PT% 47.7% / 35.8% 45.0% / 34.8%Cleveland scores well and relies on its frontcourt for inside points. Detroit defends better, rebounds well, and looks to run in transition. Those areas could matter more with Cleveland missing players.Cade Cunningham leads Detroit with 20.7 points and 9.0 assists per game. Jalen Duren adds 15.1 points and 8.5 rebounds.Evan Mobley will have a bigger role for Cleveland without Mitchell. Jarrett Allen will need to control the paint and help on the boards.Detroit comes into this game with fewer injuries and a more stable rotation. Article Summary: Cleveland cavaliers will be without donovan mitchell due to a right groin strain. Max strus is also out with a left foot jones fracture. Article Title: Kielyn Mccright: Utah State gymnast Kielyn McCright turns heads on Instagram after shining at ACC Championship
Article Text:
Utah State gymnast Kielyn McCright turns heads on Instagram after shining at ACC Championship (Image Via Getty Images)

Kielyn McCright shines on Instagram and delivers big scores for Utah State and the Crimson Tigers

Kielyn McCright is a college gymnastics star known for her balance beam skills and growing popularity on social media. Now, she is trending again. This time, it is not just for her gymnastics routines, but for photos that left fans talking. The talented athlete recently shared stunning snaps on Instagram, and her followers quickly filled the comment section with praise.McCright has built a strong fan base online. Many fans called her ‚Äúgorgeous‚Äù and ‚Äústunning,‚Äù while others said she was ‚Äútoo hot for social media.‚Äù The attention shows how popular she has become, both on and off the mat. But there is more to Kielyn McCright than social media posts. She is also a serious athlete who has delivered strong performances in college gymnastics. From Utah State to her current team, she has shown focus, skill, and heart, even while dealing with injuries.Kielyn McCright trained at American Twisters in Coconut Creek, Florida. She worked under coaches Gary Anderson and Christy Collazo Ramirez. That early training helped shape her strong beam routines.In 2022, during her freshman year at Utah State, she competed as a beam specialist in all 13 meets. That is not easy for a first year athlete.She showed calm nerves and steady form.Later, in 2024, she competed in 13 meets as a sophomore for the Crimson Tigers. She recorded a 9.850 on balance beam in an NCAA tournament. Even more impressive, she scored 9.900 three times ‚Äî once in Pittsburgh and twice in North Carolina.Last season, she competed in seven meets on beam and reached a season high of 9.875 at the ACC Championship. That event became extra special for her.However, her season was not perfect. She missed six meets due to injury. Still, she returned strong and proud.The most emotional moment came at the ACC Championship. Years ago, her father filmed her as a child and said she would one day compete on television. At the championship, that dream came true. McCright later shared the old video of her dad making that prediction. It was a full circle moment.Meanwhile, on Instagram, fans continue to support her. One follower wrote, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre too gorgeous.‚Äù Another commented, ‚ÄúToo hot for social media.‚Äù A third added, ‚ÄúOh my gosh, STUNNING.‚Äù Others said, ‚ÄúSo obsessed‚Äù and ‚ÄúLiterally gorgeous.‚ÄùKielyn McCright is clearly more than just a college gymnast. She is an athlete with strong scores, a loyal fan base, and a story that keeps growing.
Article Summary: Utah state gymnast kielyn mccright turns heads on instagram after shining at acc championship. The talented athlete recently shared stunning snaps on instagram, and her followers quickly filled the comment section with praise. Many fans called her ‚Äúgorgeous‚Äô and ‚Äústunning,‚Äù while others said she was ‚Äútoo hot for social media.

Article Title: Florida Panthers: Alex Lyon Could Face Former Florida Panthers Teammates as Buffalo Sabres Visit Amerant Bank Arena
Article Text:
Alex Lyon with the Buffalo Sabres (Via Getty Images)

Florida Panthers are desperate for more points to stay in playoff chase



The Panthers return to the ice less than 24 hours after one of their best performances of the season. Florida hosts the Sabres at Amerant Bank Arena on Friday in the second half of a crucial back-to-back for the two-time defending Stanley Cup champions.Buffalo goaltender Alex Lyon could draw the start against his former teammates. The 32-year-old spent parts of three seasons with the Panthers organization before joining the Sabres. Lyon has posted a 14-8-3 record with a 2.72 goals-against average and .913 save percentage across 27 appearances this season.The Panthers routed the Maple Leafs 5-1 on Thursday night in their first game back from the Olympic break. Brad Marchand scored twice while Evan Rodrigues, Carter Verhaeghe and Matthew Tkachuk each found the back of the net.Florida sits eight points out of a playoff spot with 24 games remaining. The defending champions understand the urgency of their situation heading into the final stretch of the regular season."Everybody understands what we need to do, and that's very important," goaltender Sergei Bobrovsky said after stopping 29 of 30 shots against Toronto."It's a big win; it's two big points for us, but tomorrow is another biggest game of the year."Daniil Tarasov is expected to start against the Sabres after backing up Bobrovsky on Thursday. The 25-year-old has an 8-8-2 record with a 2.83 goals-against average and .899 save percentage in 19 appearances.The Sabres returned from the break with a 2-1 victory at New Jersey on Wednesday. Buffalo holds the first wild card position in the Eastern Conference with a 33-19-6 record and 72 points.Tage Thompson leads the Sabres with 31 goals and 61 points. The American forward helped Team USA capture Olympic gold alongside Tkachuk in Milan. Alex Tuch and Rasmus Dahlin sit tied for second on the roster with 48 points apiece.The Sabres have dominated the season series with a 2-1-0 record against the Panthers. Buffalo outscored Florida 11-7 across those three meetings and converted on 33.3 percent of its power-play opportunities. The Panthers lost their most recent matchup 5-3 on February 2 in Buffalo.Verhaeghe has recorded four assists in three games against the Sabres this season. Florida dominated the first period against Toronto on Thursday, leading 3-0 in goals and 17-4 in scoring chances. The Panthers are 13-3-1 when leading after the opening frame, making fast starts essential during their playoff push.
Article Summary: Florida panthers host the buffalo sabres on friday night. The two-time defending stanley cup champions are eight points out of a playoff spot. The panthers beat toronto 5-1 on thursday night in their first game back from the olympic break. The sabres returned from the break with a 2-1 victory at new jersey.

Article Title: T20 World Cup: No fuss, no noise, just business - the New Zealand way
Article Text:
New Zealand's team huddles before the start of the T20 World Cup cricket match between Canada and New Zealand in Chennai, India, Tuesday, Feb. 17, 2026. (AP)

TimesofIndia.com in Colombo:

Why Pakistan don't trust Babar Azam any more | T20 World Cup 2026

Did they look bothered?



Playing at the same venue



Facing spin



Team news



New Zealand middle-order batter Mark Chapman looked perplexed when he was asked about the Super Eight groups, where all four table-toppers, who have done well in their respective groups, will end up facing each other. It has been done because of the pre-tournament seedings.The 31-year-old smiled and replied, ‚ÄúWhen it comes to scheduling and planning, that‚Äôs not really in my domain.‚ÄùChapman‚Äôs response sums up the way New Zealand play their cricket. No fuss, no theatrics, just straight down to business.After playing three matches in Chennai and one in Ahmedabad, all on red-soil pitches, the Kiwis had only one training session to adapt to the conditions ahead of their first Super Eight match against Pakistan at the R Premadasa Stadium.None of them rushed towards the pitch for a closer look. Once warm-ups were done, the players moved to the indoor nets. About an hour later, Daryl Mitchell came out barefoot to inspect the surface, spending a good fifteen minutes studying every inch of the 22 yards.Chapman, who did not get to see the surface, left it to the senior leadership group.‚ÄúIn the subcontinent, the toss always plays a factor depending on the conditions.I haven‚Äôt seen the pitch yet, so I don‚Äôt actually know what it looks like. There will be discussions behind the scenes with the senior leadership group about what we want to do,‚Äù he said.The black-soil pitches in Colombo do assist spinners, and with bigger boundaries and a slower outfield, it presents a new challenge for the 2021 T20 World Cup finalists.‚ÄúWe haven‚Äôt played in Sri Lanka yet. A lot of guys in our team have played a lot of cricket here, so I don‚Äôt see that playing too much of a factor. Guys understand what they need to do, and we are confident we will face whatever conditions are in front of us,‚Äù said Chapman, whose knees were heavily strapped.‚ÄúIn India, particularly on red-soil pitches, conditions have been favourable for batting. It has been tough for the bowlers, and the margins have been very small. We have seen scores close to 200 regularly.‚ÄúHere, it is slightly different with the slower nature of the pitches. The bowlers will hopefully get a chance to show their skills, and spinners are more likely to play a part here,‚Äù he added.Although Pakistan are stationed in Sri Lanka, they played their group matches at two different venues in Colombo.New Zealand will be the only team playing all their Super Eight matches at the same venue, facing Pakistan on February 21, Sri Lanka on February 25, and England on February 27, all at the R Premadasa Stadium.‚ÄúOne of the challenges in tournaments like these is hopping from venue to venue and adapting. When we play three games at the same place, we learn with each game.‚ÄúIt is nice to turn up at the same venue with similar pitches and adjust. Tomorrow is our first game here, so we will have to adapt anyway, but we will understand the conditions better as we go,‚Äù he said.New Zealand‚Äôs first challenge will be Pakistan‚Äôs spin-heavy attack. Usman Tariq, Abrar Ahmad, Mohammad Nawaz, Saim Ayub, and Shadab Khan form a strong unit.‚ÄúPakistan have a number of very good spinners, each with their own threat. We have played them quite frequently over the last few years.‚ÄúWe are well aware of what they will bring. For us, it is about being really clear in how we want to play against them,‚Äù he said.Obviously, there was a Usman Tariq question: ‚ÄúUsman Tariq has a unique action with the way he pauses at the crease, so that is something to factor in."Chapman, whose role is to take on spinners in the middle overs, explained why running between the wickets will be crucial.‚ÄúGiven the slower pitch and bigger boundaries, you have to change your game plan. Against spinners, it is about different options like the sweep or reverse sweep. In India, you can target straight boundaries more.‚ÄúFor me, it is about finding different areas of the ground. There are big pockets here, so it is not all about sixes. Twos, fours, and running between the wickets are very important, especially if it is not a high-scoring game,‚Äù he said.New Zealand have suffered injury setbacks. Michael Bracewell has been ruled out of the remainder of the tournament after re-injuring his left calf. Captain Mitchell Santner missed the last group match against Canada due to illness, while Lockie Ferguson returned home for the birth of his first child.‚ÄúMitchell Santner looks pretty sprightly and excited to get back on the park, barring any last-minute illness.‚ÄúLockie has just returned and is coming off a long flight. We will see how he pulls up. I cannot confirm whether he will be in the playing eleven,‚Äù Chapman said.
Article Summary: New zealand will be the only team playing all their super eight matches at the same venue, facing pakistan on february 21, sri lanka on february 25, and england on february 27. New zealand middle-order batter mark chapman looked perplexed when he was asked about the super eight groups. New zealand have suffered injury setbacks.

Article Title: Luke Humphries jokes with referee after Kirk Bevins' rare blunder at Premier League Darts night in Belfast
Article Text:
Luke Humphries jokes with referee after rare Kirk Bevins blunder at Premier League Darts night in Belfast (via Getty)

Luke Humphries laughs off rare ‚Äòkirkulator‚Äô error



Luke Humphries shared a light-hearted moment with referee Kirk Bevins during a tense quarter-final clash at Premier League Darts in Belfast. The world No 2 was facing Stephen Bunting on night four of the competition. While the match was competitive, a small scoring error from Bevins stole the spotlight early in the contest and left players and fans amused.Humphries eventually lost the match 6-4 as Bunting advanced to the semi-finals and later won the night. But it was a rare mistake from Bevins, known for his sharp maths skills, that became one of the talking points of the evening. The funny exchange between the player and the referee quickly went viral, with fans enjoying the human side of the high-pressure tournament.The incident happened when Luke Humphries was attempting to check out on 36. The 31-year-old missed his shots at double 18 and double nine. That left him in a position where he would go bust with his next throw. He decided to aim for 14 instead.However, Bevins made an unusual mistake. He called out ‚Äú31‚Äù after the throw, which confused Humphries. The player looked at him with a puzzled expression. Realising the slip, Bevins quickly corrected himself and said ‚Äúno score.‚ÄùHumphries then jokingly stared at the referee. Bevins laughed as he brushed off the error. The moment brought smiles all around. Even the official social media account of the PDC highlighted the clip. They captioned it, ‚ÄúEven the Kirkulator gets it wrong sometimes.‚ÄùFans quickly reacted online. One supporter wrote that they had to rewind the clip to watch it again and noticed that the person sitting next to Bevins also seemed confused. Another fan joked that the mistake was serious enough to cost him his job.Bevins, 39, is well known for his maths ability. Before joining darts full-time, he appeared on the BBC show Countdown in 2009. He won all eight of his heats with a record 925 points and then claimed the overall title. He is also the only contestant to achieve a perfect 15-round game on the show.He began working in darts as a voluntary scorer in 2010 and became a full PDC referee in 2013.Meanwhile, Bunting went on to beat Gian van Veen 6-2 in the final. Speaking after his win, Bunting said he had felt doubted before the tournament, with many people claiming he did not deserve his place. He added that he believes in his hard work and said these big nights are what he lives for, praising the crowd for helping him perform at his best.
Article Summary: Luke humphries lost 6-4 to stephen bunting in premier league darts quarter-final. Referee kirk bevins made a rare 'kirkulator' blunder during the match. Humphries looked at the referee with a puzzled expression. The player then jokingly laughed off the blunder and the clip went viral.

Article Title: Any win against a top team drains you: Aiden Markram
Article Text:
West Indies' captain Shai Hope, left, and South Africa's captain Aiden Markram (PTI Photo)

T20 World Cup: Sri Lanka bow out of the tournament; Pakistan‚Äôs hopes dim

AHMEDABAD: South Africa have emerged as a strong contender for the World Cup title, but Aiden Markram feels the campaign has been a tiring one. ‚ÄúNew Zealand, India and West Indies are quality team and to put in strong performances against sides like that gives you confidence,‚Äù Markram said.‚ÄúBut it honestly doesn‚Äôt feel easy. Every game drains you. The intensity is seriously high and you know things can change very quickly in T20 cricket. You wake up the next morning and it can all be over in a couple of days.‚ÄùMarkram credited the bowlers for keeping the big hitting West Indies to 176/8. He was effusive in his praise for allrounder Corbin Bosch , who nailed perfect yorkers in the final over and gave away just five runs. ‚ÄúHe keeps it really simple, trains smartly and doesn‚Äôt give himself too many options,‚Äù Markram said.West Indies captain Shai Hope backed the aggressive batting approach even though the top order collapsed on Thursday. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs always some element of risk whenever you‚Äôre batting. So if you want to challenge the opposition, then you‚Äôve got to find runs, especially on a surface like that which is so good. You still have to measure the risks in some way. If we just bat deep and only get 150-160 on a surface like that, it is always going to be tough work,‚Äù Hope said.
Article Summary: South africa have emerged as a strong contender for the world cup title. Aiden markram feels the campaign has been a tiring one. Markram credited the bowlers for keeping the big hitting west indies to 176/8. He was effusive in his praise for allrounder corbin bosch.

Article Title: Austin Reaves drops blunt three-word message as Los Angeles Lakers search for the spark
Article Text:
Austin Reaves (Image via Adam Pantozzi / National Basketball Association / Getty)

Austin Reaves breaks silence with pointed three-word fix for Los Angeles Lakers slump

The Los Angeles Lakers have been making noise during the ongoing NBA season for all the wrong reasons. After a frustrating loss against the Phoenix Suns in a recent game, the Lakers are unfortunately unable to break their losing streak. Apart from witnessing one of the longest slumps in the 2025-26 NBA season, Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô talented guard Austin Reaves shared a blunt message reflecting on the current condition of the popular NBA team.According to Austin Reaves, not everything has fallen apart for the Lakers, as the 27-year-old believes a lot can be done to improve the current situation of the team. He went on to drop a straightforward 3-word message to help the Lakers come out of the current situation.The Los Angeles Lakers are currently in one of the darkest phases during the ongoing NBA season. After losing three games back to back, the Lakers have diverted the attention of the world. After a frustrating 113-110 loss against the Phoenix Suns recently, the cracks in the team roster have become a talking point currently. However, amidst all this, Lakers‚Äô guard Austin Reaves can still see the silver lining in the dark clouds.The dynamic NBA star recently dropped a blunt 3-word message for the Los Angeles Lakers. According to him, the team should focus on redirecting their focus on the positives instead of focusing on the negatives. During a recent postgame press conference, Austin Reaves said,‚ÄúControl the controllables. There‚Äôs a handful of plays tonight. I feel like if we are better, it can swing a game. Every possession matters. I know it sounds like a clich√© because there are so many of them, but it can swing the game in either direction.‚ÄùHe further continued,‚ÄúThroughout the game, one little play, one little mistake can ignite a crowd, ignite a team, whatever it may be. So, control those controllables.‚ÄùAustin Reaves‚Äô message clearly emphasizes the current loss of the Lakers, which is related to the team‚Äôs issues with executing proper plans on the floor. Apart from the poor performance of the Lakers, Luka Doncic has become a hotbed of discussion in the NBA world due to his inconsistent performance and a whining attitude towards the referees.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are currently in one of the darkest phases during the ongoing nba season. After a frustrating 113-110 loss against the phoenix suns recently, the cracks in the team roster have become a talking point. However, amidst all this, lakers‚Äô guard austin reaves can still see the silver lining in the dark clouds.

Article Title: All weapons in Resident Evil Requiem
Article Text:
Image via Capcom

Resident Evil Requiem - How To Get All 25 Weapons & Attachment Locations

List of all weapons and locations

Starting weapons

Hatchet (Leon - Melee): Available by default. Used for parrying attacks and finishing enemies, but requires maintenance.

Alligator Snapper (Leon - Handgun): Leon‚Äôs reliable starter pistol.

Requiem Revolver (Leon & Grace): A powerful assault revolver shared between both characters during the story.

Grace‚Äôs campaign weapons

B934 Handgun: Found in the Dining Room on the Care Center‚Äôs first floor (West Wing).

S&S M232 Handgun: Located in the Bar & Lounge on the second floor; Grace‚Äôs main pistol that can be recovered after losing it early.

Makeshift Knife / Hunting Knife: Found across multiple areas. Low durability melee options.

Molotov Cocktail: Found or crafted after learning the recipe in the Care Center Basement.

Bottle of Acid: Craftable later in the game and effective against mutated enemies.

R.I.P. Knife: Available on Insanity difficulty using Antique Coins .

Leon‚Äôs campaign weapons

MSBG 500 Shotgun: Found in the Attic before the Chunk boss fight.

Classic 70 Rifle: Obtained before a rooftop sniping sequence.

Gal Submachine Gun: Located in the East Raccoon City underground parking garage.

Marksman 1A Rifle: Found inside a BSAA container in East Raccoon City.

W870 Police Shotgun: Discovered in Gun Shop Kendo.

Mortal Edge ( Melee Axe ): Dropped by a late-game boss or unlocked via challenge points.

Supply box weapons

Resident Evil Requiem breaks record on Steam

Resident Evil Requiem has a lot of different weapons that work well for both stealth and action-heavy gameplay. During the game, players rotate between Grace Ashcroft and Leon S. Kennedy. Depending on the scenario and how far along the story is, each character gets access to different weaponry.The game encourages players to explore every region to obtain better gear, from basic handguns and melee weapons to heavy rifles, shotguns, and additional unlocks. You can also improve several weapons by using supply boxes. This increases their damage, fire rate, and ammo capacity. Advanced tuning unlocks greater upgrade levels later in the game, which makes guns even better against tougher adversaries and bosses.Players can purchase weapons like the Silencer 9 handgun, 990-TAC shotgun, and Stiri REVO3 A1 SMG using credits earned during gameplay.Completing challenges unlocks powerful gear such as Freya‚Äôs Needle machine pistol, Kotetsu knife, Matilda IMP burst handgun, Ghost Grudge revolver, Redemption assault rifle, and the RPG-7 rocket launcher.Resident Evil Requiem has had a great start on PC, breaking the franchise's record on Steam.The game had more than 260,000 players at the same time shortly after it came out, which was greater than Resident Evil 4 Remake and Resident Evil 7.The strong launch numbers highlight the game‚Äôs popularity and positive reception among fans. With availability across PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch 2, the total player base is expected to grow further in the coming weeks.Resident Evil Requiem is going to be one of the biggest games in the series thus yet. It includes a lot of weapons, lets you play as two characters, and had a tremendous launch.
Article Summary: Resident evil requiem has had a great start on pc, breaking the franchise's record on steam. The game had more than 260,000 players at the same time shortly after it came out. During the game, players rotate between grace ashcroft and leon s. kennedy. Depending on the scenario and how far along the story is, each character gets access to different weaponry.
